src:
Možda i ključna bitka za Evropu
Derbi ovog kola Superlige igra se u Senti gde će TSC ugostiti Radnički iz Niša

03 Nov 2019

Radnički je krenuo nešto sporije, TSC je redom gazio i u jednom trenutku činilo se da bi vrlo lako mogli da se „rotiraju“ na tabeli. Topolski sportski klub i dalje je tu negde blizu izlaska na evropsku scenu, ali u međuvremenu se i Radnički pod komandom Milorada Kosanovića vratio u život i sada je sve otvoreno. Pa bi zato duel 15. kola Superlige mogao da bude od izuzetnog značaja. Ne toliko zbog samog ishoda jer mnogo je još ostalo do kraja sezone, već zato što bi i jednima i drugima pobeda bila veliki impuls za nastavak takmičenja.
Veliko je pitanje ko je sada favorit, pošto TSC u šest mečeva u Senti nije još doživeo poraz, dok Radnički ne briljira na strani. Ipak, uglavnom uspeva da „reši“ slabije rivale, pa je vezao tri pobede na gostovanjima, u Inđiji, Šapcu i na Banjici. Samo što nije baš tako jasno ko je ovde kvalitetniji sastav, pa je, bez obzira na buđenje Kosanovićeve ekipe, ovde možda bolje zaokružiti tip 0-2, jer smo više od dva gola videli na samo jednom od šest gostovanja Radničkog i na samo jednom od šest TSC-ovih mečeva u Senti.
Kad već pomenusmo Kosanovića, podsetimo da je on na klupi Radničkog nasledio Sima Krunića, koji se prošle nedelje vratio u Radnik što znači da bi ubuduće trebalo da gledamo mnogo defanzivnije Surduličane, a koliko će to uspešno zatvoriti novi šef struke moći ćemo da naslutimo već protiv Voždovca, koji forsira najotvoreniji fudbal u ligi. Što će reći da ovo nije baš najbolji izbor za vaše tikete.
Dvojka Čukaričkog u Mačvi bi već mogla da bude, mada će Brđani biti psihički istrošeni posle derbija sa Partizanom. Primetićemo i da je šest od poslednjih sedam susreta Napretka i Spartaka u Kruševcu završeno u omeru 0-2 gola, na čak četiri nismo videli nijedan pogodak, dok očekujemo da bi mnogo atraktivniji mogao da bude sudar Javora i Inđije, jer u Ivanjičani igraju mnogo ofanzivnije no što smo navikli u prošlosti, a i jedni i drugi bi ovde morali da pojure bodove spasa.

SRBIJA 1 - 15. KOLO: 


Subota

Partizan - Vojvodina 4:0 (2:0)/Natho 29 pen i 43, Zdjelar 48, Sakik 69/
Proleter - Crvena zvezda 0:2 (0:0)/Garsija 59, Boaći 82/

Nedelja



13.00:  (2,25) Inđija  (3,15)  Javor (3,45) 

15.00:  (2,85) TSC  (3,10)  Radnički Niš (2,60) 

15.00:  (5,00) Mačva  (3,40)  Čukarčki (1,80) 

15.00:  (2,15) Napredak  (3,20)  Spartak (3,60) 

15.00:  (2,60) Rad  (3,05)  Mladost (2,90) 

15.00:  (2,45) Radnik  (3,10)  Voždovac (3,10) 


NAPOMENA: Kvote su podložne promenama 



Foto: Star Sport
text:
Perhaps a pivotal battle for Europe as well
This Superliga derby is played in Senta where TSC will host Radnicki from Nis

03 Nov 2019

The workers moved slightly slower, the TSC stepped in succession and at one point it seemed that they could easily "rotate" on the table. The Poplar Sports Club is still around the European scene, but in the meantime, Radnicki, under the command of Milorad Kosanovic, has come back to life and everything is open now. That is why a Superliga 15th round match could be extremely important. Not so much because of the outcome as there is much left to the end of the season, but because both wins would be a big impulse to continue the competition.
The big question is who is the favorite now, as TSC has not yet been defeated in six matches in Senta, while Radnicki is not on the sidelines. However, he mostly manages to "settle" weaker rivals, so he tied three victories in away games in Indjija, Sabac and Banjica. It's just not clear who is the better team here, so regardless of the awakening of Kosanovic's team, it may be better to round out the 0-2 tip here, as we have seen more than two goals in only one of Radnicki's six away games and only one of six TSC matches in Senta.
Speaking of Kosanovic, let us remind you that he succeeded Sim Krunic on the Radnicki bench, who returned to Radnik last week, which means that we should look at the much more defensive Surdulicans in the future, and how successful it will be to close the new head of the profession, we can guess already Vozdovac, who is forcing the most open football in the league. Which is to say that this is not exactly the best choice for your tickets.
The Cukaricka Duel in Sword could already be, though Brjan will be mentally worn out after the Partizan derby. We will also notice that six of the last seven meetings of Napredak and Spartak in Krusevac ended in a 0-2 goal, we did not see any hits on four, while we expect that the collision between Javor and Indjija could be much more attractive, as they play much more offensive in Ivanjica but we are used to it in the past, and both would have to rush to the rescue points here.

SERBIA 1 - 15TH ROUND:


Saturday

Partizan - Vojvodina 4: 0 (2: 0) / Natho 29 pins and 43, Zdjelar 48, Sakik 69 /
Proleter - Crvena Zvezda 0: 2 (0: 0) / Garcia 59, Boaci 82 /

Sunday



13.00: (2,25) Indjija (3,15) Maple (3,45)

3pm: (2.85) TSC (3.10) Radnički Niš (2.60)

15.00: (5.00) Sword (3.40) Chukarchi (1.80)

15.00: (2.15) Progress (3.20) Spartak (3.60)

3pm: (2.60) Work (3.05) Youth (2.90)
